author: Fiona Flynn
title: Watch: So Chris Pratt, Amy Schumer, Jennifer Lawrence and Aziz Ansari made a (very) short film
text:
It appears these four stars all hung out together this weekend if their Instagram accounts are anything to go by, and we REALLY wish we had been a fly on that wall. Or just been there. They would totally want to be our friends... right?
Anyways, Aziz Ansari uploaded the below short film to Instagram which he captioned; “CHRIS PRATT AND AZIZ ANSARI present… ‘Hi Guys', crediting Jennifer Lawrence as the director, Amy Schumer as director of photography, and all four of them as writers.
While Schumer also posted a video of a pretty loud wake up call she got (or is it her sister??) from Lawrence and Ansari...
(That's Lawrence at the start holding the mug.)
Pratt and Lawrence are starring together in the sci-fi romance Passengers, while Schumer and Ansari are currently on tour with the Oddball Comedy Festival. Also Schumer and Lawrence are said to be writing a screenplay together too and you probably know already that Pratt and Ansari star in Park and Recreation together.
All of this explains why they may have been hanging out this weekend... we're sure they'll call us next time.
